title: Biopharma SHAKTI
description: Strategy for Healthcare Advancement through Knowledge, Technology and Innovation to develop India as a global Biopharma manufacturing hub. Includes 3 new NIPERs and upgrading 7 existing ones.

title: India Semiconductor Mission (ISM) 2.0
description: Expanded mission to produce equipment and materials, design full-stack Indian IP, and fortify supply chains.

title: Electronics Components Manufacturing Scheme
description: Increased outlay to capitalise on the momentum of electronics component manufacturing.

title: Rare Earth Corridors
description: Establishment of dedicated corridors to promote mining, processing, research, and manufacturing of rare earths.
state: Odisha, Kerala, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu

title: Dedicated Chemical Parks
description: Scheme to support States in establishing 3 dedicated Chemical Parks through the challenge route on a cluster-based plug-and-play model.

title: Hi-Tech Tool Rooms
description: Establishment of digitally enabled automated service bureaus at 2 locations by CPSEs for high-precision component manufacturing.

title: Construction and Infrastructure Equipment (CIE) Scheme
description: Scheme to strengthen domestic manufacturing of high-value and technologically-advanced construction equipment.

title: Container Manufacturing Scheme
description: Scheme to create a globally competitive container manufacturing ecosystem.

title: Textile Expansion and Employment Scheme
description: Modernization of traditional clusters with capital support for machinery, technology upgradation, and testing centres.

title: National Handloom and Handicraft Programme
description: Integration of existing schemes to ensure targeted support for weavers and artisans.

title: Tex-Eco Initiative
description: Initiative to promote globally competitive and sustainable textiles and apparels.

title: Samarth 2.0
description: Upgrading the textile skilling ecosystem through collaboration with industry and academic institutions.

title: Mega Textile Parks
description: Setting up of Mega Textile Parks in challenge mode focusing on value addition to technical textiles.

title: Mahatma Gandhi Gram Swaraj Initiative
description: Initiative to strengthen khadi, handloom, and handicrafts for global market linkage and branding.

title: Sports Goods Manufacturing Initiative
description: Dedicated initiative to promote manufacturing, research, and innovation in sports equipment design.

title: Legacy Industrial Clusters Revival
description: Scheme to revive 200 legacy industrial clusters to improve cost competitiveness and efficiency.

title: SME Growth Fund
description: Dedicated fund to create future 'Champion' MSMEs by incentivizing enterprises based on select criteria.

title: Self-Reliant India Fund (Top-up)
description: Additional funding to continue support for micro enterprises and maintain their access to risk capital.

title: Corporate Mitras
description: Development of a cadre of accredited para-professionals to help MSMEs meet compliance requirements.

title: Public Capital Expenditure (Capex)
description: Central government allocation for capital expenditure in FY2026-27.

title: Infrastructure Risk Guarantee Fund
description: Fund to provide prudently calibrated partial credit guarantees to lenders for infrastructure projects.

title: Dedicated Freight Corridors (New)
description: Establishment of new corridors connecting Dankuni in the East to Surat in the West.

title: National Waterways Operationalization
description: Operationalising 20 new National Waterways starting with NW-5 and connecting mineral rich areas to ports.

title: Ship Repair Ecosystem
description: Setting up of ship repair ecosystems catering to inland waterways.

title: Coastal Cargo Promotion Scheme
description: Incentivising modal shift to increase share of inland waterways and coastal shipping from 6% to 12%.

title: Seaplane VGF Scheme
description: Viability Gap Funding scheme to provide support for seaplane operations and indigenize manufacturing.

title: Carbon Capture Utilization and Storage (CCUS)
description: Scheme to adopt CCUS technologies in power, steel, cement, refineries, and chemicals sectors.

title: City Economic Regions (CER)
description: Allocation for implementing plans of City Economic Regions based on specific growth drivers.

title: High-Speed Rail Corridors
description: Development of 7 corridors: Mumbai-Pune, Pune-Hyderabad, Hyderabad-Bengaluru, Hyderabad-Chennai, Chennai-Bengaluru, Delhi-Varanasi, Varanasi-Siliguri.
state: Multiple States (MH, TS, KA, TN, DL, UP, WB)

title: Municipal Bonds Incentive
description: Incentive for single issuance of municipal bonds of more than ₹1000 crore.

title: Allied Health Professionals (AHP) Institutes
description: Upgrading existing and establishing new AHP institutions in 10 selected disciplines to add 100,000 AHPs.

title: Caregiver Training Programme
description: NSQF-aligned programmes to train 1.5 lakh multiskilled caregivers.

title: Regional Medical Hubs
description: Scheme to support States in establishing 5 Regional Medical Hubs for Medical Value Tourism.

title: All India Institutes of Ayurveda
description: Setting up 3 new All India Institutes of Ayurveda.

title: Veterinary College Subsidy Scheme
description: Loan-linked capital subsidy support for establishment of veterinary colleges, hospitals, and labs.

title: AVGC Content Creator Labs
description: Setting up AVGC Content Creator Labs in 15,000 secondary schools and 500 colleges.

title: National Institute of Design (New)
description: Establishment of a new NID in the eastern region of India.

title: University Townships
description: Creating 5 University Townships in the vicinity of major industrial and logistic corridors.

title: Girls' Hostels Scheme
description: Establishment of 1 girls' hostel in Higher Education STEM institutions in every district.

title: Telescope Infrastructure Facilities
description: Setting up or upgrading 4 facilities: National Large Solar Telescope, National Large Optical-infrared Telescope, Himalayan Chandra Telescope, and COSMOS-2 Planetarium.

title: National Institute of Hospitality
description: Upgrading the existing National Council for Hotel Management and Catering Technology.

title: Tourist Guide Upskilling Scheme
description: Pilot scheme for upskilling 10,000 guides in 20 iconic tourist sites.

title: National Destination Digital Knowledge Grid
description: Digital documentation of all places of cultural, spiritual, and heritage significance.

title: Mountain Trails Development
description: Development of ecologically sustainable trails in HP, UK, J&K, Araku Valley (AP), and Podhigai Malai (TN/KL border).

title: Turtle Trails
description: Development of trails along key nesting sites in coastal areas.

title: Bird Watching Trails
description: Development of bird watching trails along Pulikat lake.

title: Archaeological Sites Development
description: Developing 15 archeological sites (e.g., Lothal, Dholavira, Rakhigarhi, Adichanallur, Sarnath, Hastinapur, Leh Palace) into vibrant cultural destinations.

title: Global Big Cat Summit
description: India to host the first-ever Global Big Cat Summit for conservation strategies.

title: Khelo India Mission (Expanded)
description: Transformation of the Sports sector over the next decade with integrated talent development.

title: Fisheries Reservoir Development
description: Integrated development of 500 reservoirs and Amrit Sarovars.

title: Animal Husbandry Entrepreneurship
description: Credit-Linked Subsidy Programme and support for Livestock Farmer Producers Organisations.

title: Coconut Promotion Scheme
description: Scheme to increase production and replace old trees with new saplings.

title: Indian Cashew and Cocoa Programme
description: Programme to make India self-reliant in raw cashew/cocoa and build global brands.

title: Sandalwood Cultivation Programme
description: Partnering with States to promote focused cultivation and post-harvest processing.

title: High-Density Orchards Programme
description: Rejuvenation of old orchards and expansion of walnuts, almonds, and pine nuts.

title: Bharat-VISTAAR
description: Virtually Integrated System to Access Agricultural Resources - AI tool integrating AgriStack.

title: SHE Marts
description: Self-Help Entrepreneur Marts set up as community-owned retail outlets for women within cluster level federations.

title: Divyangjan Kaushal Yojana
description: Livelihood training for Divyangjans in IT, AVGC, Hospitality, and F&B sectors.

title: Divyang Sahara Yojana
description: Scheme for timely access to high-quality assistive devices and setting up Assistive Technology Marts.

title: NIMHANS-2
description: Setting up a new National Institute for Mental Health in North India.

title: Emergency and Trauma Care Centres
description: Establishing centres in District Hospitals to increase capacity by 50%.

title: Purvodaya: East Coast Industrial Corridor
description: Development of an integrated corridor with a node at Durgapur.

title: Purvodaya: E-Buses
description: Provision of 4,000 e-buses for the Purvodaya States.

title: Buddhist Circuits Development (NE)
description: Development of circuits in Arunachal Pradesh, Sikkim, Assam, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura.

title: Finance Commission Grants
description: Grants provided to states for FY 27 including Rural/Urban Local Body Grants.

title: SASCI Scheme
description: Support to states under the SASCI Scheme.

title: CPSE REITs
description: Setting up dedicated REITs to recycle real estate assets of CPSEs.

title: WHO Global Traditional Medicine Centre Upgrade
description: Upgrading the centre in Jamnagar to bolster evidence-based research.

title: Upgrade of AYUSH Pharmacies
description: Upgrading AYUSH pharmacies and Drug Testing Labs for higher certification standards.

title: TReDS Measures
description: Mandating TReDS for CPSEs and introducing credit guarantee support.

title: High Level Committee on Banking
description: Committee to review the banking sector and align it with India's growth phase.

title: PFC & REC Restructuring
description: Restructuring Power Finance Corporation and Rural Electrification Corporation.

title: Education to Employment Committee
description: High-Powered Standing Committee to focus on Services Sector as a core driver.

title: Foreign Assets of Small Taxpayers Disclosure Scheme
description: One-time 6-month foreign asset disclosure scheme for small taxpayers.
